subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: This spring, Sean Henn has worked six hitless and scoreless innings over six games. Against Ron Villone, opponents have batted .455 with 10 hits and 5 earned runs in five innings.
snippet: This spring, Sean Henn has worked six hitless and scoreless innings over six games. Against Ron Villone, opponents have batted .455 with 10 hits and 5 earned runs in five innings.
